story.name: Mira
sentences: Sir Hero, I am the fairy of this village and I am here to guide you!
I summoned you to help our kingdom fight the dark forces that are at our doorstep.
Liberate our Shrine taken by the Skulls' army! The enemy keeps me imprisoned there! Hurry!
Exit the village by the north and go through the forest to the west. You should find the entrance in the narrow mountains...
